foreignData.name: Sirene des lautlosen Gesangs
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Inspiriert — Immer wenn die Sirene des lautlosen Gesangs enttappt wird, wirft jeder Gegner eine Karte aus seiner Hand ab und legt dann die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.name: Sirena de la canción taciturna
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Inspiración — Siempre que la Sirena de la canción taciturna se enderece, cada oponente descarta una carta, luego pone la primera carta de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignData.name: Sirène au chant silencieux
foreignData.text:
Vol
Inspiration — À chaque fois la Sirène au chant silencieux devient dégagée, chaque adversaire se défausse d'une carte, puis met la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignData.name: Sirena del Canto Silente
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ispirazione — Ogniqualvolta la Sirena del Canto Silente viene STAPpata, ogni avversario scarta una carta, poi mette nel proprio cimitero la prima carta del proprio grimorio.

foreignData.name: 静寂の歌のセイレーン
foreignData.text:
飛行
神啓 ― 静寂の歌のセイレーンがアンタップ状態になるたび、各対戦相手はそれぞれカードを１枚捨て、その後自分のライブラリーの一番上のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・セイレーン

foreignData.name: 침묵을 노래하는 세이렌
foreignData.text:
비행
영감 — 침묵을 노래하는 세이렌이 언탭될 때마다, 각 상대는 카드 한 장을 버리고 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignData.name: Sirena da Canção Silenciosa
foreignData.text:
Voar
Inspirado — Toda vez que Sirena da Canção Silenciosa se torna desvirada, cada oponente descarta um card e, depois, coloca o card do topo de seu grimório no próprio cemitério.

foreignData.name: Сирена Безмолвной Песни
foreignData.text:
Полет
Одухотворение — Каждый раз, когда Сирена Безмолвной Песни становится развернутой, каждый оппонент сбрасывает карту, затем кладет верхнюю карту своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignData.name: 默曲塞连
foreignData.text:
飞行
启悟～每当默曲塞连成为未横置时，每位对手各弃一张牌，然后将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。

foreignData.name: 默曲塞連
foreignData.text:
飛行
啟悟～每當默曲塞連成為未橫置時，每位對手各棄一張牌，然後將其牌庫頂牌置入其墳墓場。

name: Siren of the Silent Song
originalText:
Flying
Inspired — Whenever Siren of the Silent Song becomes untapped, each opponent discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: Inspired abilities trigger no matter how the creature becomes untapped: by the turn-based action at the beginning of the untap step or by a spell or ability.

If an inspired ability triggers during your untap step, the ability will be put on the stack at the beginning of your upkeep. If the ability creates one or more token creatures, those creatures won’t be able to attack that turn (unless they gain haste).
Inspired abilities don’t trigger when the creature enters the battlefield.
If the inspired ability includes an optional cost, you decide whether to pay that cost as the ability resolves. You can do this even if the creature leaves the battlefield in response to the ability.

text:
Flying
Inspired — Whenever Siren of the Silent Song becomes untapped, each opponent discards a card, then each opponent mills a card.
